1.title: London Vigil
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Redwall Memory
1.plot: Sixteen years ago, Beijing resident Li Kai joined over 10,000 other ordinary Chinese on their way to the center of the capital. They calmly gathered on Fuyou Street, the location of China's Central Appeals Office-and right next to Zhongnanhai, the seat of China's regime and living quarters for the Communist Party leadership.

2.title: Snow Mei
2.plot: Two extraordinary woman witness a unique era.

3.title: The European Choice
3.plot: In 2013 the European Parliament has put the People's Republic of China on notice that its practice of forced organ harvesting is unacceptable. A resolution passed Thursday afternoon in Strasbourg, France, expresses "deep concern over persistent and credible reports of systematic, state-sanctioned organ harvesting from non-consenting prisoners of conscience in the People's Republic of China, including from large numbers of Falun Gong practitioners imprisoned for their religious beliefs, and members of other religious and ethnic minority groups."

4.title: A Trip Afar
4.plot: At 14:00 on November 20th, 2001, 36 Westerners from 15 countries gathered in Tiananmen Square. They quietly sat cross-legged and pulled up a large banner that read "Truthfulness, Compassion, Tolerance". 17 seconds after displaying the banner, police surrounded them. Who were they? Why did they gather in Tiananmen Square? What was their fate?

5.title: World Falun Dafa Day
5.plot: Manhattan, New York, one of the world's most prosperous cities. Since 1999, May 13 each year, many Falun Gong practitioners and supporters from around the world have come here to celebrate World Falun Dafa Day.

6.title: After Gunfire
6.plot: During Zeng Qinghong's visit to south Africa, Australian Falun Gong practitioners shot by hired thugs while on the way to initiate a lawsuit.

7.title: Eternal Waves
7.plot: In Changchun, March 5, 2002, a handful of unknown Chinese martyrs aided the cause of freedom around the world.

8.title: Prolonged Reunion
8.plot: In a distant city near the Arctic Circle, two sisters band together to save their mother from torture at the hands of the Chinese Communist Party.

imdb.plot outline: The world as a whole is changing. There are events that are occurring around the world that are bringing people face-to-face with themselves and challenging what many of us believe we know about ourselves as human beings. Legends Unfolding is a television series that follows the lives of people who have experienced extraordinary events which have changed them and they're ways of thinking. The series follows these remarkable individuals as they set out on a journey to improve the ways that they interact with the world around them.
imdb.title: Legends Unfolding
plot: _Legends Unfolding_ (qv) is a television series that follows the lives of people who have experienced extraordinary events.

The world as a whole is changing. There are events that are occurring around the world that are bringing people face-to-face with themselves and challenging what many of us believe we know about ourselves as human beings. _Legends Unfolding_ (qv) is a television series that follows the lives of people who have experienced extraordinary events which have changed them and they're ways of thinking. The series follows these remarkable individuals as they set out on a journey to improve the ways that they interact with the world around them.
